Container.Name: AutoKuma
Container.Overview: AutoKuma is a utility that automates the creation of Uptime Kuma monitors based on Docker container labels. With AutoKuma, you can eliminate the need for manual monitor creation in the Uptime Kuma UI.
Container.Requires:
Requires a separate Uptime Kuma server
Requires Docker containers to be labeled with the appropriate "Docker label prefix" You can add labels to a Docker container using the "Add another Path, Port, Variable, Label or Device" button in the Docker container settings. More about required labels here: https://github.com/BigBoot/AutoKuma?tab=readme-ov-file#usage-

Config.Name: Uptime Kuma URL
Config.Description: URL of the Uptime Kuma instance to add monitors to

Config.Name: Uptime Kuma username
Config.Description: Uptime Kuma username, required if auth is enabled

Config.Name: Uptime Kuma password
Config.Description: Uptime Kuma password, required if auth is enabled

Config.Name: Uptime Kuma MFA token
Config.Description: Uptime Kuma MFA token, required if MFA is enabled

Config.Name: Uptime Kuma tag name
Config.Description: The name of the AutoKuma tag, used to track managed containers

Config.Name: Uptime Kuma tag color
Config.Description: The color of the AutoKuma tag

Config.Name: Docker label prefix
Config.Description: The prefix for Docker labels that AutoKuma should look for

Config.Name: On deletion action
Config.Description: The action to take on the Uptime Kuma monitor when a container is deleted

Config.Name: Uptime Kuma headers
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of HTTP headers to send when connecting to Uptime Kuma

Config.Name: Uptime Kuma connection timeout
Config.Description: The timeout for the initial connection to Uptime Kuma, in seconds

Config.Name: Uptime Kuma call timeout
Config.Description: TThe timeout for executing calls to the Uptime Kuma server, in seconds

Config.Name: Static monitor configuration paths
Config.Description: Path to the directory inside the container containing static monitor configurations

Config.Name: AutoKuma static monitor configurations
Config.Description: Path to the directory containing static monitor configurations
